snippet: Dartmouth College’s four valedictorians will all be working in business, despite the financial crisis.
abstract: Three of the four Dartmouth valedictorians graduating in 2012 will move on to careers at major Wall Street investment banks, despite evidence that the appeal of the financial industry has dimmed among elite graduates.
lead_paragraph: Dartmouth College’s four valedictorians will all be working in business, despite the financial crisis.

headline.seo: Wall Street Appeal Remains High With Top Graduates
headline.main: Finance Jobs Still Appeal to Graduates at Dartmouth
headline.print_headline: Finance Jobs Still Appeal To Graduates At Dartmouth
